meanings.sent1: The antiradar paint on the stealth fighter made it invisible to enemy radar.
meanings.sent2: The military developed antiradar technology to protect their aircraft from detection.
meanings.sent3: The antiradar cloak turned the spy into a ghost on the radar screen.
meanings.sent4: Her silence was like an antiradar shield, deflecting any attempts to uncover her secrets.
meanings.sent5: The antiradar material was so effective that even the most advanced radar systems couldn't detect it.

meanings.definition: A device or technology designed to prevent radar detection.
meanings.sent1: The antiradar device on the submarine kept it hidden from enemy ships.
meanings.sent2: Pilots rely on antiradar systems to avoid detection during covert missions.
meanings.sent3: The antiradar gadget malfunctioned, causing chaos during the mission.
meanings.sent4: The antiradar technology acted like a cloak of invisibility for the aircraft.
meanings.sent5: The new antiradar invention revolutionized the way military operations were conducted.
